profile.name: Daniel Litvak
profile.headline: Engineer / Programmer / Developer
profile.summary: Engineer who is passionate about computers, robotics, machine learning, and programming, with a journey that started in Scratch, explored C#, and now focuses on JavaScript and p5.js projects.

bio.short: Engineer passionate about computers, robotics, machine learning, and programming, currently focused on JavaScript and p5.js projects.
bio.long: I'm an engineer who is passionate about everything to do with computers, robotics, machine learning and programming. I began my journey with Scratch, then dived into C# before settling on working with JavaScript, specifically with the library p5.js. Many of my proudest projects have been created with this library, so explore and become inspired!

highlights: Built a real-time data visualization dashboard
Collaborated to troubleshoot and fix API endpoints using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python
Teaching and helping high school students to succeed in exams and excel in course assignments
Provided customer service through order management and kitchen operations
Maintained cleanliness, supported inventory, and coordinated with the team
